that you hold on to the yarn carefully until the magic_ring is tightened see tutorial magic_ring or magic_ring round 1 make 1 standing double_crochet per tutorial below or alternatively you can use 3 chains as the first double_crochet then make 11 dcs into the ring after the first standing double_crochet there will be a total 12 dcs for a multiple of the 3-stitch pattern below standing double_crochet round 2 make 1 standing double_crochet or 3 chain then 1 double_crochet into the same stitch below make 2 dcs in each double_crochet in the 1st round join the last double_crochet with the standing double_crochet with a slip_stitch total 24 dcs round 3 make 1 standing double_crochet or 3 chain then make 2 dcs into the next stitch make 1 double_crochet into the next stitch then make 2 dcs in the next stitch repeat 10 more times join the last double_crochet with the standing double_crochet with a slip_stitch total 36 dcs 1 dried squid knits & crafts round 4 make 1 standing double_crochet or 3 chain make 1 double_crochet into the next stitch then make 2 dcs into the next stitch make 1 double_crochet into each of the next 2 stitches then make 2 dcs in the next stitch repeat 10 more times join the last double_crochet with the standing double_crochet with a slip stitch total 48 dcs round 5 make 1 standing double_crochet or 3 chain make 1 double_crochet into the next stitch then make 2 dcs into the next stitch make 1 double_crochet into each of the next 2 stitches then make 2 dcs in the next stitch repeat 10 more times join the last double_crochet with the standing double_crochet with a slip stitch total 60 dcs i do not recommend that you use ghost yarn to make a larger size bottle bag as the water bottle would be too heavy when filled and the bag may stretch beyond its attractiveness bodyofthebottlebag round 1 make 1 standing double_crochet or 3 chain to start the round make a bobble stitch using the standing double_crochet or 3 chain as one of the double_crochet in the bobble chain 2 skip 2 stitches below make a bobble stitch chain 2 repeat until the last 2 stitches chain 2 join the second chain with the first bobble stitch to close the circle how to make a bobble stitch - crochet/amigurumi round 2 using one or two slip stitches move to the chain 2 space make a bobble stitch into the chain 2 space chain 2 skip 2 stitches repeat until the chain 2 meets the first bobble stitch join the second chain with the first bobble in this round with slip_stitch to close the circle repeat round 2 above 13 more rounds or until
